channel.title: RSCScar [RuneScape Classic Private Server]
channel.description:
[size=26pt]Welcome to RSCScar[/size]
Hi all happy! Our idea (XpecTz & Iatex) with this server is to have an active wilderness, with ripe administrators and moderators. We will keep the economy at a reasonable level and do so fair competitions as possible!
RSCScar is currently F2P with a maximum level 99th We will probably upgrade this to P2P maximum level of 99 or so we will keep F2P and raise the max level to 110. It all depends on how it goes:).
With mature and experienced administrators and mature players, this server can go far as we hope. Runescape for us is awfully funny that we hope you also think and that is why you play .. Have a nice day and see you on RSCScar!
[u][b][size=10pt]We offer our members:[/size][/b][/u] * RSCDaemon/EasyRSC/Stork based server. * Clan system + ClanTags. * PK styled. * Good looking client. * Large client. * Good game play. * Many updates. * Mature Mods/Administrators. [u] [b][size=10pt]Server details:[/size][/b][/u] * Clan system + Clan Tags infront of your name + ClanChat. * Delay for npc attacking. * Theiving . * Good money start (Mans hut). * 1k start money + Food Chef. * The monsters are duplicated 2x. * F2P with 99 max stat. (Will upgrade to P2P or stay F2P with 110 max stat. * XP rate = 50x / Donators = 50x x 1.5. * XP in wilderness = 65x. * Big + Small client. * 10 minutes AFK delay
[b][size=8pt]Regular Commands:[/size][/b] ::say ::online / ::onlinelist ::skull ::stuck (30 seconds delay)
[b][size=8pt]ClanCommands:[/size][/b] ::createclan <name> ::Invite <name> ::Clanaccept ::C <your clanmesssage> ::Leaveclan ::Clankick <name> [b] [size=8pt]ClanLeader commands:[/size][/b] ::Clankick <name> ::Claninvite <name> ::C <your Message> ::Clanmod <name> (Coming soon).
[b][size=10pt]Information:[/size][/b] Download the client and login (Registers your character when you first time login.) OBS: You can only create one character every 10 minutes. You can only be in 1 clan at same time, and you can only create 1 clan each 2 hours.. ClanModerate a member in your private clan is about to come soon. If Clan leader kick you out from clan or if you leave a clan then logout after, to get full effect.
[b] link to small client[/b]: [url=http://www.speedyshare.com/files/21855486/RSCS_Small_client_v1.2.rar]http://www.speedyshare.com/files/21855486/RSCS_Small_client_v1.2.rar[/url]
[b]big client link[/b]:[url=http://www.speedyshare.com/files/21852499/RSCScar_client_V1.2.rar] http://www.speedyshare.com/files/21852499/RSCScar_client_V1.2.rar[/url]
[b] Pictures:[/b]
[img]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/4349/ss20100409212810.png[/img]
[img]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/1685/ss20100408192833a.png[/img]
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3/ss20100408191829.png[/img]
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9047/ss20100408191912.png[/img]
[img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/715/ss20100408192324.png[/img]

Shouldn’t we like eachother cause we have the same (maybe even quite unique) interest

[quote=“Daniel Son, post:81, topic:336062”][quote author=Krypton link=topic=432440.msg3188453#msg3188453 date=1271994266]

They’re seriously pathetic lol…

Oh and your are not? don’t answer I don’t care.

I see nothing wrong with use 2 names as I explained it pretty wel in my last post, You are just so fucking jealous kryptix… That has to be the reason why you care soo much about everyone else .

You and crooks are fuckin idiots, you guys have been quoting your own posts on other accounts and commenting YOURSELVES, saying thank you to YOURSELF. How much lower can you guys get? Go outside for Christ sake.
[/quote]
Yet you are sitting here… Flaming that he’s doing that? I’m pretty sure your life is worse bud. you ‘fuckin’ idiot.[/quote]
That makes a lot of sense? I made a post, while hes been doing it for weeks, lets think about this you ignorant child.
